price: 9. En voor degenen die geloven en goede daden verrichten, zeker, Wij zullen hen de (poorten van) de rechtvaardigen binnen laten gaan.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lanud'khilannahum fī al-ṣāliḥīna
